Revolutionize Your Logistics Operations Through an Efficient Courier Software Courier Software
Revolutionize Your Logistics Operations Through an Efficient Courier Software
Courier Software Technology has simplified our work to a great extent, thereby ensuring fewer chances of errors.Courier software is one such technological invention that has helped courier companies around the world to improve their customer service.Improved experience • Quick reply • Automated billing Our Advantages
Improved Experience
With this software, customers can now have a more enjoyable experience.10 years back, customers had to make a number of calls to track the progress of their order.But the introduction of courier software in the business has made it easier and one can simply visit the website and track his package.Customers can also place orders for pick-up.Improved Experience
Quick Reply
Automated billing This tracking software is synchronized with another program, known as accounting software to facilitate automated billing.With this, customers no longer need to fill the information manually that further saves the time of both customers and the company.This software is available at a very reasonable cost and aims to manage couriers and packages efficiently.For a courier company, it is important to make sure that its operations are duly met with maximum customer satisfaction.Every enterprise with courier operations must get this software from a reputed company.FarEye courier software aims to automate logistics process by ensuring time bound pick-ups and increased on-time deliveries.It helps courier based companies to seek complete control over their operations.Contact : Plot No.1, Okahla Phase 3, New Delhi - 11020.Call : +91-11-47473381 Email : Contact@fareye.in

Presentation Transcript
Courier & Logistics Date : 01-09-2015
RANDlogistics Couriers At RANDlogistics, we provide cheap courier in United kingdom and across the world.We are the only courier service provider that can provide you with fast and affordable freight and courier transport services.Visit us, as we are the best one-stop online courier and freight delivery service in UK.Courier • A courier is a person or company employed to deliver messages, packages and mail.• distinguished from ordinary mail services by features such as speed, security, tracking, signature, specialization and individualization of services, and committed delivery times, which are optional for most everyday mail services.• couriers are usually more expensive than usual mail services
Logistics • Logistics is the management of the flow of goods, information and other resources, including energy and people.•  involves the integration of information, transportation, inventory, warehousing, material-handling, and packaging, and occasionally security.Difference Between Courier & Logistics Courier services offers to serve only documents and portable goods (not big consignments).Courier services is better to send and receive documents fast and safe.Few courier services providers offer portable goods transport those are not very big in size and heavy.Courier service provider company's in India are, Blue Dart, Gati Courier, DTDC, etc.Logistics Company offers to serve heavy goods transport through truck, rail, flights.Logistics service provider company's in India are, DHL, etc.
Contd…..The basic difference between courier and logistics company is that logistics deals with the business network that manages material, information, capital flows and services to the customers.It is a wider concept in all together.Courier companies usually deals with the management and shipment of small packages but now a days even they have started making it big by investing in big freight ventures.We usually compares such companies on basic 3 S's: service, safety and speed provided by them.If a courier company is rated more than a logistic in these 3 S's in an area then go for it.Additionally, it depends on the type of item you want to transport.I usually prefer fast and secure courier company for small household transportation and logistics company for bigger shipments.Introduction to Courier Industry • Till 1980, dependent on Post-office for Mail transfer.• Then, private players relieved us from the dependent on Post-office.• And promised to deliver documents Faster and safer.• Today industry’s 40% growth per annum.(Total Industry Rs.7000 Cr.) • Dominant players are Blue Dart, DHL, SkyPAK, Elbee and Speed Post.To know more about our services please visit https://www.randlogistics.com/
Thank you

5 Challenges Courier Companies Face While Doing Medical Deliveries
Description:

Transcript and Presenter's Notes

Title: 5 Challenges Courier Companies Face While Doing Medical Deliveries1
5 CHALLENGES COURIER COMPANIES FACE WHILE DOING
MEDICAL DELIVERIES
2
WHAT ALL DO MEDICAL DELIVERIES INCLUDE?If we think about it, Medical Deliveries can
include almost anything.MACHINERY Oxygen cylinders, dialysis machines,
defibrillators etc.
EQUIPMENT Syringes, needles, masks and gloves,
surgical equipment, stethoscopes etc.
DRUGS and CHEMICALS This is self-explanatory.3
DELIVERY DEADLINES
As far as medical deliveries are concerned,
delivery deadlines become all the more important
because in many cases, it may involve the matter
of life and death.Medical couriers also do not have any kind of a
time cushion for completion of delivery, which
makes each second all the more tense and
important.Even the slightest miscommunication can lead to
bigger ramifications.4
SAFETY
Medical deliveries are the trickiest and probably
the most fragile couriers out there.This is
primarily because companies need to take utmost
safety precautions.When transporting specimens or samples, they have
to be done in vacuum sealed chambers which too
cannot take much bumps or damage or else itll be
irreparably damaged.Then theres also the threat to the drivers as
the spilling of even prolonged exposure to
harmful chemicals can cause future mishaps.5
ADDITIONAL AND SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS
Courier companies need to prepare their vehicles
for any and every type of medical package.Some drugs and chemicals require to be kept in a
specific temperature to prevent spoilage thatll
render them useless.Dialysis machines, oxygen
tanks and other such machines can be damaged and
are even inflammable.Thus, companies require
harnesses and other such apparatus to keep them
stable.Courier companies also need to spend on
technologies that instantly adapts to changing
patient needs.6
EXTRA CAUTION AND TRANSPARENCY
Medical deliveries are something that every party
involved constantly wants to keep track of.While other kinds of deliveries may have the
option of scheduling a delivery as urgent or
not, medical deliveries are urgent most of the
times and require companies to keep updating the
recipient without fail.Other steps include ensuring the vetting of
everyone handling the medical couriers as well as
spending more on efficient tracking mechanisms.7
WORKFORCE REQUIREMENTS
Medical courier companies often face a problem
when patients desire the same driver to handle
all their deliveries.This is because the latter
far outnumber the staff of such companies, thus
creating workforce shortages.For medical couriers, companies require drivers
with basic medical knowledge so that the latter
can judge the situation and handle it, if
something goes slightly wrong during delivery.Eg.If a sealed box is exposed from a side or
there are signs of decay in perishable medical
couriers.8
POSSIBLE SOLUTIONS
The solutions to these challenges are in these
challenges itself!Medical couriers are indeed tricky and if
companies need to perfect this, additional
investments are needed.These investments shall
be directed towards hiring a professionally able
staff that can handle these couriers with utmost
care.Additionally, tie ups are required with agencies
that would readily provide the protective
equipment to safely package the couriers as well
as provide a level of safety to the ones shipping
them.9
WHO TO TRUST FOR SAFE MEDICAL DELIVERIES?You should only trust a company that provides a
wide variety of medical deliverables as well as
is trusted for its quickness, efficiency and
safety - the 3 main requisites for successful
medical deliveries.SENPEX COURIERS is your go-to option in such a
case.From bio specimens to surgical equipment,
vaccines, samples and pharmacy among others,
Senpex can deliver it all.
